title: The Climate Crisis and the Global Green New Deal
itunes:title: The Climate Crisis and the Global Green New Deal
description: UMass Amherst professor and PERI Co-Director Robert Pollin discusses his latest book that he co-authored with Noam Chomsky, about the Global Green New Deal and the opportunities and challenges that lie ahead in addressing the climate crisis
content:encoded: UMass Amherst professor and PERI Co-Director Robert Pollin discusses his latest book that he co-authored with Noam Chomsky, about the Global Green New Deal and the opportunities and challenges that lie ahead in addressing the climate crisis

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
